name: Fake Interview Registration Fee Scam
description: Scammer impersonates Infosys HR claiming the victim has been shortlisted from Naukri.com, then demands a registration fee and shares a phishing portal link for the fake interview process.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Candidate, Based on your resume on Naukri.com, you have been shortlisted for a Senior Developer position at Infosys. Interview scheduled for tomorrow. Please confirm by registering.
turns.notes: Initial bait using reputed company name and job portal to appear legitimate.

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for confirming your interest. To complete your registration for the interview, a non-refundable processing fee of Rs 3,000 is required. This covers document verification and interview scheduling. Please arrange the payment at the earliest.
turns.notes: Scammer introduces the registration fee concept without revealing payment details yet.

turns.scammer_message: Please transfer Rs 3,000 to our HR department account number 8899776655443322 (Axis Bank, IFSC: UTIB0001234). For any queries, contact our placement coordinator at +91-7766889900. Payment must be completed before 5 PM today for tomorrow's interview slot.
turns.notes: Scammer reveals fake bank account and phone number for the supposed HR department.

turns.scammer_message: Once payment is confirmed, please complete your candidate profile on our interview portal: http://infosys-careers-portal.com/register. Upload your resume, Aadhaar card, and PAN card. This is mandatory for the interview process as per company policy.
turns.notes: Scammer shares phishing link to harvest personal documents and identity information.

turns.scammer_message: We have only 2 interview slots remaining for tomorrow. If we don't receive your payment of Rs 3,000 to account 8899776655443322 and completed profile on http://infosys-careers-portal.com/register within the next hour, your candidacy will be cancelled. Call +91-7766889900 if you need help.
turns.notes: Final pressure combining all fake data points with artificial deadline.
